ygData.subject: RE: White Scales
ygData.msgSnippet: We have 2 ways of getting white scales: Kill Gore and the person closest to completeing their epic still needing the scale gets it. Take our twinks and kill
ygData.messageBody:
We have 2 ways of getting white scales: Kill Gore and the person closest to
completeing their epic still needing the scale gets it. Take our twinks and
kill Vox, with the understanding the raid is for soandso's white scale.
Personally, I have only done the music sheets part. I'm checking on Phin
regularly now as we've killed him a couple times but no backbone so far. I
still need the skull from Karnors. I'm told the warlord is camped pretty
solid. My cleric has an amy whip, so if multiquest doesn't get nerfed I'm
good. Guild has a red scale for me they say and I have the metal bits. I do
wonder what changed with the addition of the Undead bard that can spawn
Trak. Forpar makes a lute neck and a body, but does he combine the 2 before
you get Trak guts now?

Brilinnia Ban'sidhe
Venator Sapentia, Xegony
